idealProfile.subtitle: Manage the ideal AI profile for this vacancy.

generator.title: Generate Ideal AI Profile
generator.description: Generate an ideal profile based on the vacancy description.
generator.processingDescription: AI is analyzing vacancy description and creating profile...

whatIs.title: What is an ideal profile?
whatIs.description: An ideal profile is a psychometric portrait of a candidate perfectly suited for this position. Based on the job description, AI determines optimal values for personality traits, soft skills, and motivational factors.

whyNeed.title: Why do you need it?
benefits: Automatic matching of suitable candidates from the Talent Market
Reduced hiring errors based on intuition

howWorks.title: How generation works
howWorks.step3: You can manually edit the profile

tokenCost.title: Generation cost
tokenCost.oneTime: One-time operation — editing after generation is free

disc.title: DISC
disc.styles: D (Dominance) — directness and results orientation | I (Influence) — enthusiasm and ability to inspire | S (Steadiness) — reliability and patience | C (Compliance) — accuracy and attention to detail

mbti.title: MBTI
mbti.dichotomies: E/I (energy source: external world or internal) | S/N (information perception: facts or possibilities) | T/F (decision making: logic or emotions) | J/P (life organization: structure or flexibility)

testDescriptions.bigFive: Scientifically validated personality model. Measures 5 core traits that determine human behavior at work and in life.
testDescriptions.mbti: Personality typology based on 4 dichotomies. Determines thinking style, decision-making, and interaction with the world.
testDescriptions.disc: Behavioral styles model. Shows how a person responds to tasks, challenges, and working with people.
testDescriptions.eq: Emotional intelligence. The ability to understand one's own and others' emotions and manage them effectively.
testDescriptions.softSkills: Key professional competencies. Universal skills important for any position.
testDescriptions.motivation: Internal drivers. Determines what motivates a person to work and achieve goals.

bigFive.openness: Interest in new things, creativity, and curiosity. Affects the ability to innovate and adapt.
bigFive.conscientiousness: Organization, reliability, and self-discipline. Key factor in work effectiveness and goal achievement.
bigFive.extraversion: Sociability and energy. Determines comfort in social interactions and working with people.
bigFive.agreeableness: Empathy and willingness to cooperate. Critical for teamwork and building relationships.
bigFive.neuroticism: Emotional resilience to stress. The lower - the better at handling pressure and uncertainty.

eq.self_awareness: Understanding your emotions and their impact. Foundation of emotional intelligence and conscious behavior.
eq.self_management: Impulse control and emotional flexibility. Ability to manage reactions in difficult situations.
eq.social_awareness: Empathy and reading others' emotions. Key to effective interaction and understanding needs.
eq.relationship_management: Conflict management and building connections. Important for leadership and team influence.

softSkills.communication: Clarity of expression and active listening. Basic skill for effective work in any role.
softSkills.teamwork: Ability to collaborate and support colleagues. Foundation of productive teamwork and synergy.
softSkills.critical_thinking: Analytical abilities and making informed decisions. Important for solving complex tasks.
softSkills.adaptability: Flexibility to change and quick learning. Critical in a rapidly changing business environment.
softSkills.initiative: Proactivity and drive for results. Distinguishes strong performers from mediocre ones.

motivation.achievement: Striving for success and achieving results. Key driver for ambitious goals and growth.
motivation.power: Desire to influence, control, and lead. Important for management and leadership positions.
motivation.affiliation: Need for social connections and acceptance. Important for team players and corporate culture.
motivation.autonomy: Independence and self-reliance at work. Critical for positions with high degree of freedom.
motivation.security: Striving for stability and predictability. Balance is important for long-term loyalty.
motivation.growth: Thirst for development, learning, and self-improvement. The higher - the better for growing companies.

confirmRestore: Are you sure you want to restore this vacancy?

tabs.comparisonDescription: Compare multiple candidates for this vacancy using AI
